channel.title: Forum of Lies 7 - Fool and Revenant Win
channel.description:
**This game is hosted by @eevee, co-hosted by @BS4125, under the supervision of @Queen_Alfa.**
###Rules
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. Respect the host and the players 3. If you haven't posted content in 36 hours, you'll be prodded for inactivity. If you don't respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 4. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 5. Do not screenshot private host messages 6. Don't throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 7. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 8. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for host. 9. Please add links in the main post to every notable event (FoL Events) 10. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 11. Let's all have fun and play together!
###Gameplay 1. Days last 96 hours (4 days), or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 48 hours (2 days). 2. All actions, must be sent in your role chat. 3. Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server. 4. Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server. 5. All classes will be used and will be used as they are found in the Class Card Thread.
###Executions 1. To accuse someone say "/accuse [player]" or "/vote [player]" 2. Votes saying Guilty or Not Guilty before the target is on the stand will not be counted. 3. Should the votes reach the majority, that player will go on trial. They can say a defence, and the rest of the players must vote Guilty or Not Guilty on the thread. 4. Players can discuss while the target is on trial. 5. No one is able to use day powers when a trial is in session. The Only exception is the king’s Decide Fate. 6. Every trial will go on for 24 hours. Only exception is if the king uses decide fate ability. 7. The day timer does not stop when the target is on trial. 8. If the option with the most votes is what happens to the target.
###Journals PM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone
###Possible roles (by alignments) [details=Summary]**King**: (Good (33%) / Evil (Unseen or Cult) (33%) / Coward (11%) / Fanatical (11%) / Greedy (Promotion only) / Mad (Promotion only) / Psychopathic (11%)) In brackets chance for following king at the begining of game
**[color=steblue]BD Investigative[/color]**: (Sherif / Maid / Princess / Observer) **[color=steblue]BD Support[/color]**: (Court Wizard / Physician / Priest / Squire) **[color=steblue]BD Offensive[/color]**: (Butler) **[color=steblue]BD Killler[/color]**: (Paladin / Knight / Prince) **[color=steblue]BD Social[/color]**: (Noble / Psychic)
**[color=purple]Unseen Special:[/color]** (Mastermind) **[color=purple]Unseen Killer:[/color]** (Assassin / Moon Spirit) **[color=purple]Unseen Investigative:[/color]** (Duchess / Nightwatch / Waitress) **[color=purple]Unseen Support:[/color]** (Page / Soulcatcher / Sellsword) **[color=purple]Unseen Social:[/color]** (Aristocrat / Illusionist) **[color=purple]Unseen Offensive:[/color]** (Sage / Servant / Enforcer / Herbalist)
**[color=red]Cult Special:[/color]** (Cult Leader / Acolyte) **[color=red]Cult Social:[/color]** (Apostle) **[color=red]Cult Support:[/color]** (Ritualist) **[color=red]Cult Investigative:[/color]** (Seeker) **[color=red]Cult Offensive:[/color]** (Invoker)
**Neutral Killer:** (Demon / Electrocutioner / Possessor / Revenant (Spiritualist) ) **Neutral Support:** (Mercenary / Alchemist / Guardian) **Neutral Offensive:** (Greedy) **Neutral Wildcard:** (Fool / Serpent)
At any point anyone might request a rolecard for any of this classes on own role chat. [/details]
###To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
###Players: 1. PKR - **[color=grey] Revenant [/color]** 2. Polik - **[color=ligblue] Prince [/color]** - DEAD 3. Bounty -> PurpleyPete -> Snapshot 4. FadeBlade - **[color=ligblue] Good King [/color]** - DEAD 5. Jammy - **[color=ligblue] Good King [/color]** - DEAD 6. Noz - **[color=ligblue] Observer [/color]** - DEAD 7. Unknown **[color=purple] Sellsword [/color]** - DEAD 8. Sketch - **[color=pink] Fool [/color]** - DEAD 9. ThePlex - **[color=ligblue] Observer [/color]** - DEAD 10. Orange 11. Moleland - **[color=blue] Possessor [/color]** - DEAD 12. Damafaud - **[color=red]Psy[/color][color=orange]chop[/color][color=yellow]athi[/color][color=green]c king[/color]** - DEAD 13. Frostwolf - **[color=ligblue] Knight [/color]** - DEAD 14. Ingeel - **[color=purple] Assassin [/color]** - DEAD 15. Simon 16. Mantichora -> Hippolytus - **[color=ligblue] Noble [/color]** - DEAD
###Graveyard: 1. Noz - **[color=ligblue] Observer [/color]** - Killed N1 2. PKR - **[color=grey]Spiritualist[/color]** - Died in a ritual N1 3. Sketch - **[color=pink]Fool[/color]** - Lynched D2 4. Damafaud - **[color=red]Psy[/color][color=orange]chop[/color][color=yellow]athi[/color][color=green]c king[/color]** - killed N2 5. ThePlex - **[color=ligblue] Observer [/color]** - Killed N2 6. Polik - **[color=ligblue] Prince [/color]** - Killed N2 7. Jammy - **[color=ligblue] Good King [/color]** - Killed N3 8. Hippolytus - **[color=ligblue] Noble [/color]** - Killed N3 9. Unknown - **[color=purple] Sellsword [/color]** - Killed N3 10. Fade - **[color=ligblue] Good King [/color]** - Killed N4 11. Frostwolf - **[color=ligblue] Knight [/color]** - Killed N4 12. Moleland - **[color=blue] Possessor [/color]** - Lynched D5 13. Ingeel - **[color=purple] Assassin [/color]** - Lynched D6
###Timer http://itsalmo.st/#day7end
###Timestamps [Day 1 start](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-7-day-1-begins/2058/55?u=eevee) [Night 1 start](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-7-night-1/2058/157?u=eevee) [Night 2 start](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-7-day-2/2058/1282?u=eevee) [Night 3 start](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-7-day-4/2058/1821?u=eevee) [Night 4 / Day 5 start](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-7-night-4/2058/2393?u=eevee) [Day 7 start](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-7-day-7/2058/3298?u=eevee)

item.title: Forum of Lies 7 - Fool and Revenant Win
item.dc:creator: PolikShadowbliss
item.description:
I suggest the Psycho King be one of those classes that hides his true nature under a Facade of being a Good King.

Also, I think the Bulter should get killed by the guards before he even has the chance to poison the King.

Read full topic

item.description:
